Package io.permazen.maven

Permazen Maven plugins.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMainSchemaMojo
    Provides data appropriate for "main" tasks (as opposed to test tasks).
    AbstractSchemaMojo
    Generates a schema XML file from a set of Permazen model classes.
    GenerateSchemaMojo
    Generates a schema XML file from a set of Permazen model classes.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on permazen-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn permazen:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    VerifySchemaMojo
    Verify the Permazen schema auto-generated from user-supplied model classes.

Package io.permazen.maven Description

Permazen Maven plugins.
